mapper.select: SELECT mno, id, animalhosp_no, animalhosp_name, hsop_roadname_address, animalhosp_pic, hsop_phonenum, star_total, rv_cnt FROM ( SELECT M.MNO AS mno, M.ID AS id, A.ANIMALHOSP_NO AS animalhosp_no, A.ANIMALHOSP_NAME AS animalhosp_name, A.HSOP_ROADNAME_ADDRESS AS hsop_roadname_address, A.ANIMALHOSP_PIC AS animalhosp_pic, A.HSOP_PHONENUM AS hsop_phonenum, A.STAR_TOTAL AS star_total, A.RV_CNT AS rv_cnt, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ANIMALHOSP_MAIN A INNER JOIN MARK M ON A.ANIMALHOSP_NO = M.ANIMALHOSP_NO WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY M.MNO DESC ) WHERE rn <= #{cri.amount} * #{cri.pageNum} AND rn > #{cri.amount} * (#{cri.pageNum} - 1)

SELECT /*+ INDEX(A ANIMALHOSP_NAME_INDEX) */ mno, id, animalhosp_no, animalhosp_name, hsop_roadname_address, animalhosp_pic, hsop_phonenum, star_total, rv_cnt FROM ( SELECT M.MNO AS mno, M.ID AS id, A.ANIMALHOSP_NO AS animalhosp_no, A.ANIMALHOSP_NAME AS animalhosp_name, A.HSOP_ROADNAME_ADDRESS AS hsop_roadname_address, A.ANIMALHOSP_PIC AS animalhosp_pic, A.HSOP_PHONENUM AS hsop_phonenum, A.STAR_TOTAL AS star_total, A.RV_CNT AS rv_cnt, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ANIMALHOSP_MAIN A INNER JOIN MARK M ON A.ANIMALHOSP_NO = M.ANIMALHOSP_NO WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY A.ANIMALHOSP_NAME ASC ) WHERE rn <= #{cri.amount} * #{cri.pageNum} AND rn > #{cri.amount} * (#{cri.pageNum} - 1)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MARK WHERE animalhosp_no = #{animalhosp_no} AND id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MARK WHERE id = #{id}
